home.title: An open source Flash Player emulator
home.intro: Made to run natively on all modern operating systems and browsers, Ruffle brings Flash content back to life with no extra fuss.
home.safe-description: Using the guarantees of Rust and WASM, we avoid the security pitfalls Flash was known for.
home.easy-description: Whether you're a user or a website owner, we've made it as easy as possible to get up and running.
home.free-description: Licensed MIT/Apache 2.0, you're free to use Ruffle how you please!

footer.tagline: Putting Flash back on the web
